title: Moon Globe
summaries: The Moon Globe is a thrown consumable item purchased from the Zoologist for 3 GC after the Bestiary is 50% complete (270 entries). When a Moon Globe is thrown and shatters on a surface, the world's moon style will be randomized to one of 9 options.

statistics.Tooltip:
Toss it to change how the moon looks!
'Time for a change of scenery'
statistics.Buy: 3 GC
statistics.Sell: 60 SC
